text: AWS Profile: brkthru-mediatool-dev (NOT prod)
Commit after each logical unit of work
Platform buys (56,020), media plans, and platform entities (142,333) not yet migrated
Benefits include no duplicate business logic, versioned calculations, consistent validation, complete audit trail, and bulk operations support up to 1000 records per request
All calculated fields include metadata: value, calculationVersion, calculatedAt, context, formula
Updated .gitignore to ignore entire data/ directory
Master scripts created include run-production-etl.ts, quick-start-etl.sh, detect-schema-changes.ts, migrate-mongo-database.ts

Current improvements include adding ActiveFilters tab, fixing result count, redesigning toolbar layout, creating Priority pill renderer, fixing Status column total, adding Remaining column, adding stats UI blocks, and updating dev docs
This is the canonical PostgreSQL backup that should be used for transformations
Field categories include Input, Calculated, Dynamic, and System
Completed Bravo-1 Directory Structure Cleanup on 2025-06-27
New workflow stores only raw PostgreSQL exports in S3
Implemented Calculation Engine v1.0.0 with separated concerns
Export types include CampaignEntity, CampaignInput, CampaignUpdate, CampaignListItem, CampaignMetricsType, CampaignStatusType
Views use complex SQL with CTEs and window functions
Integrated toolbar combining search/filters/active filters in one component
Enhanced MongoDB Guide with SQL mindset comparison, advanced patterns, troubleshooting, tools list from archived guides
Contains 238,463 documents extracted from PostgreSQL on 2025-06-18
Contains specific questions for clarification
Remaining entities need migration: strategies (13,417), line items (4,118), platform buys (56,020), media plans, platform entities (142,333), accounts (9,796), users (326)
Runs in Docker on port 5432
Missing elements include: full media buy implementation, platform integrations, reporting dashboards, and mobile support
Contextual rules defined in roundingRules: YouTube+views uses DISPLAY_SUBCENT (3 decimals), Facebook+video uses 4 decimals
Implemented BigNumber.js for calculations
User data is embedded in team object (owner, leadAccountManager, mediaTrader)
Includes non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, and security
Organized export structure: exports/raw/, exports/transformed/, exports/temp/, exports/logs/
TypeScript files already use toISOString() which is always UTC
PostgreSQL to MongoDB migration for bravo-1
Created comprehensive ETL system for production data synchronization
Never batch multiple unrelated changes
RESTRUCTURE-INSTRUCTIONS.md removed as complete
IMPORTANT Git Commit Guidelines for bravo-1 project: Commit frequently with meaningful messages using conventional format (feat:, fix:, docs:, style:, refactor:, test:, chore:)
Working on Bravo-1 Campaign UI Updates
handleMediaStrategy function checks budget allocation to determine if strategy exists
Workaround handles Promise-based instances and forces grid refresh
ag-grid-enterprise: v33.3.2
API is now the only way to load data via /api/etl/import and bulk endpoints
Uses separate collections for campaigns, strategies, lineItems (NOT embedded)
Enabled pre-commit hooks via trunk git-hooks sync
135 campaigns failed due to validation issues
This loads all 13,417 campaigns vs the 5 test campaigns from seed script
Completed comprehensive schema design session on 2025-06-23 with Ryan's feedback
load-data.ts loads transformed data back to MongoDB with automatic backup
Default policies: storage=6 decimals, display/api=2 decimals
Export preserves all relationships
Original calculationEngine export now uses the adapter, ensuring existing code continues working while new code can use calculationEngineV2 directly
Ensures consistent timestamps regardless of server timezone (previously was BST/UTC+1)
Widened columns: Category from 150px to 160px, Priority from 130px to 140px, Progress from 140px to 170px
Warning: Do not run pipeline multiple times in production until fixed
Key files include CLAUDE.md (AI assistant guidance), .gitignore (excludes all data directories), and docker-compose.yml (MongoDB container setup).
Never edit files in /media-tool/
Use new field names directly
Component shows filter conditions like 'Today-7d to Today' for date ranges
Created .prettierrc.json with single quotes and 100 char width
Archived outdated docs: KEY-DIFFERENCES.md, POSTGRESQL-VIEW-REQUIREMENTS.md, POSTGRES-MONGODB-COMPARISON.md
Removed empty directories: data-export/, data-transformed/, exports/
Each campaign row has 'Init Strategy' or 'Edit Strategy' button
Bravo-1 lint status after trunk setup: Auto-formatted 57 files

Recommended implementation tasks include replacing custom modals with HeadlessUI Dialog component, replacing theme toggle with HeadlessUI RadioGroup or Switch, using Combobox for searchable dropdowns, implementing Menu for dropdown menus, adding Disclosure for collapsible sections, and using Transition for smooth animations
Remaining issues: 24 low-priority markdown warnings (MD040 fenced code blocks, MD024 duplicate headings, MD034 bare URLs)
Current state includes 13,417 campaigns with real user data, transformation working, S3 uploads working but transformed data was empty, application connects successfully to MongoDB
Upgraded from zod 3.22.4 to 3.25.0 (includes Zod 4 via import from 'zod/v4')
Created clean top-level structure: backend/, data/, docs/, frontend/, scripts/, shared/, tests/
No dual-field support needed
Fixed all documentation to use correct profile and bucket name
Using PostgreSQL as source for local media_tool database
Created new setupGridStatePersistence function that saves filters, columns, sorting, and grouping to URL
All data now uses clean schema with no backward compatibility fields
Version history needs type-safe snapshots to preserve financial precision
ESLint configs in backend/.eslintrc.json and frontend/.eslintrc.json with strict TypeScript rules

Next steps include implementing LineItemService with calculation engine, creating bulk endpoints for line items, extending ETL import to handle strategies and line items, adding comprehensive calculation tests, and implementing logging for calculation audit trail
Container name is bravo1_mongodb
AG Grid React Components Demo - Major UI/UX Improvements (December 2024)
Created raw export script in bravo-1/scripts/postgres-export/
Campaigns page tested with Playwright
Documentation created includes ETL-PRODUCTION-WORKFLOW.md and ETL-SYSTEM-DESIGN.md
Campaign calculated fields include: budget.remaining, allocationPercentage, spendPercentage, pacing metrics
PostgreSQL views analysis includes detailed_campaigns for denormalized data with calculated metrics
Working on Bravo-1 Schema Implementation

Technical implementation details include: Created calculateStats() helper function, Stats update on filterChanged and modelUpdated events, Fixed ActiveFilters to show filter type for date filters, Used correct filter types, Removed displayedRowCount state variable
PostgreSQL has real users linked via zoho_user_id to campaigns.owner_user_id
GitHub Issues to create for Bravo-1 from RYANS_WISH_LIST.md
Updated PIPELINE-TIMESTAMPED-EXPORTS.md documentation to explain UTC usage
Documented entities include Campaigns, Media Strategies, Line Items, Platform Buys, Media Plans, Platform Buy Daily Impressions, and Platform Buy Daily Videos
Seed script has been removed
Created raw PostgreSQL export with 848,937 records (924MB)
Data was already migrated
Turborepo Evaluation: Evaluate Turborepo for better monorepo management
Changed impressions to units with unitType field
Dark mode toggle present
Modified files include src/utils/gridStateUtils.ts (new), src/index.ts, README.md, and demo
